text: 7:6 Rom 2:29; 6:4; 8:2; 2 Korin 3:6Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn e Kraisɨn mɨn ovengegha faragha en suighizir biziba, e da ataki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses Osirizir Araziba uam en suirazir puvatɨzɨ e fɨriaghɨre. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn en ingangarir e amiba, ua Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn, Godɨn Duam e gamima e tuavir igiamɨn gɨn ghua ingangarim gami.
